6th season of buffy is not good at all in the begining. But acording to me and many others with me the best episodes ever in Buffy airs in this season.."once more with feelings"  either you love it or you hate it..
And bye the way "once more with feelings" is james martres(spike) favourite episode;) 

you will raise you eyebrowns alot in this season..mostly it is good but there is some really bad things too:(

if have you not seen it... download it now!!! 
And if there are some one who have not seen buffy at all I strongly suggest you downlaod the first season..and if you think the firts season was nooo good..then just wait the second season rules!!!

@ther the correct name for Spike is James Marsters. Yes it is his voice, because he has his own band. Actually everyone's voice in "Once more with Feeling" are all the real voices. Only thing is, Allison Hannigan only6 sang a few lines because she felt her voice was terrible. The girl who plays Tara sang beautifully! Giles is a veteran when it comes to singing. Everyone else, well, they were ok.
